rooms.description: Sleek entry hall with a minimalistic design that aligns with Vastu principles by orienting the entrance to receive positive energy, featuring built-in shoe racks and ambient lighting.
Spacious open-plan living area for relaxation with a central seating arrangement near the courtyard access. The room includes integrated soundproofing and ample windows for natural light.
Modern kitchenette designed with energy-efficient appliances, ergonomic worktops, and an island that doubles as a breakfast nook; window overlooking the courtyard to promote fresh air.
Well-lit bathroom integrated with ground floor space, featuring non-slip tiles and water-saving fixtures in compliance with local building norms.
A dedicated home office designed as a quiet retreat for work and creativity. Includes built-in storage and ergonomic design; positioned with a view of the private courtyard to foster productivity.
A compact, well-ventilated private gym integrated into the floor plan with dedicated space for fitness equipment, mirrored walls, and soundproofing for privacy.
Designated area that provides access to the central courtyard. The courtyard serves as a communal garden space, promoting natural light and fresh air circulation in line with Vastu principles.
